title:
Ranks of Matrices of Logarithms of Algebraic Numbers II: The Matrix
  Coefficient Conjecture
abstract:
Many questions in number theory concern the nonvanishing of determinants of
square matrices of logarithms (complex or p-adic) of algebraic numbers. We
present a new conjecture that states that if such a matrix has vanishing
determinant, then after a rational change of basis on the left and right, it
can be made to have a vanishing coefficient.
